name: 'Toy Story 2' Minutiae, Part 3 Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Al falls asleep the first night he has Woody, he spills a bowl full of snacks on the floor. What snack food was it?
questions.explanation:
Cheetos.

	They form a sort of mine field that Woody must tip-toe through to get to Al and get his right arm out of his shirt pocket.

questions.text: The toy cleaner-fixer comes to Al's to fix Woody. Which of the following things he does to Woody is done after all the others?
questions.correct: paints over 'ANDY' on his boot sole
questions.explanation:
paints over 'ANDY' on his boot sole.

	The cleaner does all these things.

questions.text: When the rescue team crosses the street to get to Al's store, they hide under orange traffic cones, causing havoc when they stop for oncoming traffic. Which toy is the last to finish crossing the street?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Potato Head

	His foot got stuck on a piece of gum. He unknowingly escapes death when a concrete pipe almost rolls over him.

questions.text: What toy helps some of the rescue team navigate through Al's store?

Buzz unfortunately encounters a new Buzz Lightyear who captures and confines him. The new Buzz joins up with the others. Not knowing their names, he calls them by descriptive names instead. Which of the following was *NOT* a name that new Buzz called members of the rescue team?
questions.explanation:
Springy Dog.

	They were all called these names. But it was Jessie that called Slinky Dog 'Springy Dog'.

questions.text: When the real Buzz escapes, he gets trapped in the store. He spills some boxes onto the door pad to open it. What toy does he unintentionally awaken?
On what floor is Al's apartment?
questions.explanation:
23.

	An oversight on the story writers' part: the rescue team enter's Al's building through a ground-level vent, then travel only sideways to get to the top of the elevator car. They would've need to go up 10 feet to do this. Also, they exit to a vent that should be at the level of the ceiling of the 23rd floor apartments, but appear at a floor-level vent.

questions.text: When the rescue team gets to the vent grate, it's stuck. How do they open it?
questions.correct: use Rex as a battering ram
options: use one of the coins in Hamm to pry it open
questions.explanation:
use Rex as a battering ram.

	'But I don't want to use my head!' - Rex

questions.text: What martial art does Hamm claim to have when he jumps on top of Stinky Pete's box?
